message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $100 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $88 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $90.
